import React,{useEffect,useState} from "react" function EditPack(){ const [packages,setPacks]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:8070/package/all").then((result)=>{ result.json().then((resp)=>{ // console.warn(resp) setPacks(resp) }) }) }) console.warn(packages) return(

All Packages

{this.state.packages.map((packages,index)=>( ))}
Count Package Name Package ID Destination NumberofDays NumberofPassengers Hotel Transport TourGuide TotalPrice(Rs) Action
{index+1} {packages.name} {packages.packId} {packages.destination} {packages.numofdays} {packages.nopass} {packages.hotel} {packages.transport} {packages.tourGuide} {packages.totPrice}  
) } export default EditPack;
